snippet.title: Listen to the Wind -  Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Listen to the Wind, the sword action game that takes place during the Ming dynasty era will be releasing in September 23rd  2021.

About the game:
"Listen to the Wind" is a side-scrolling hack-and-slash game with counter attacks as the game's core mechanic. It takes pace during the Ming dynasty Jiajing era where you'll be battling Japanese pirates. It features unique martial art heroes and a story branching gameplay.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1641450/Listen_to_the_Wind/
